strategy: Apply a gradient boosting ensemble (e.g., XGBoost or LightGBM) with tree-depth regularization and early stopping on time-based splits. Use target encoding for categorical variables with high cardinality, and perform logarithmic transformation on skewed numeric features (e.g., 'GrLivArea', 'LotArea') to improve normality and reduce outliers. Introduce cross-validation with time-based splits to avoid data leakage, ensuring that the model learns temporal patterns without overfitting to recent data.
